content.raw:
Hector/Derek,

[PR#286](#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/286) and [PR#287](#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/287/fix-local-bridge/diff) have been merged.  The former addresses the ``Couldn`t open X display :1`` issue and the [documentation](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/CloudsimDockerCompose) updated.

```
# Use now the new script to launch docker-compose

$ ./run_docker_compose.sh
```

The later fixes the `CommsClient::Register: Problem registering with broker` issue, and the [documentation](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/cloudsim) has also been updated \(i.e. use one single bridge for a local system in the same network\).

```
# Update your SubT workspace

$ cd ~/subt_ws/src/
$ hg pull && hg up -C
```
content.html:
Hector/Derek,

PR#286 and PR#287 have been merged. The former addresses the Couldn`t open X display :1 issue and the documentation updated.

# Use now the new script to launch docker-compose

$ ./run_docker_compose.sh

The later fixes the CommsClient::Register: Problem registering with broker issue, and the documentation has also been updated (i.e. use one single bridge for a local system in the same network).

# Update your SubT workspace

$ cd ~/subt_ws/src/
$ hg pull && hg up -C
